channel.title: Old pc game
channel.description: Ok, this is a bit of an odd question, but this is the only place i can think to ask it. I don't know if it was just my school or others to, but remember all the computer games you could play in like 2nd grade ex: Oregon Trails. Well I am looking for a game, it was interesting then and i never got to play on the computer much, but i cannot remember the games name. You were like climbing a mountain or something, and had to collect gems and stuff, it involved math, thats all i really remember, but i want to find a copy because...well i'm bored as hell right now, does any one know what it is called?

item.title: Old pc game
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

You guys suck using Google!

Is this is?http://www.download-full-games.com/pc/educational/super_solvers:_treasure_mountain.html

Read full topic

item.title: Old pc game
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I remember this game Too bad I can’t think of the name.

At the top, you had to climb a ladder (and move side to side sometimes) and solve math problems before the boss dude knocked you off or something weird.
And you could collect snowballs to throw at the boss…ARG

I’ll keep looking for it.

edit: AHA

Try ‘treasure mountain’. I think this is it…
OH MAH GOD
http://www.download-full-games.com/pc/educational/super_solvers:_treasure_mountain.html
tada?

Read full topic

@dracar wrote:

hmm not the whole mountain, it was like zoomed in on your char, i think it was cartoonish and 3d, but like i said i don’t really remember so that could be wrong…

item.title: Old pc game
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Sorry, I don’t know what you’re talking about then. Do you remember what it was like? Third person or first person? Very cartoonish? Poorly or well drawn? What was the scale (did you see the whole mountain at one time, or just small steps)? Stuff like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Old pc game
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

I don’t really remember anything else, well i guess you didn’t really climb the mountain, you sorta took a path up, i think it was like there was a path that went all the way around the mountain, you could walk all the way around, and after you collected the gems or items or w/e it was, you could get into the cave and go up to the next level…

Read full topic

item.title: Old pc game
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

lets see, thats all i really can remember, i think the goal was to get to the top of the mountain, only reason i want the game is i am like ocd with games, i have never beat that game so i have to download and beat it…

yea i think it was just like use ur math skillz to get to the top of the mountain, solve puzzles and shit on the way up, like to unlock doors and stuff, also i think one you unlock had like a rope to the next lvl, not sure about that though

item.title: Old pc game
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:4, topic:128745”]He said he wants a game where you collect gems and climb mountains. Lets see. Has math in it… Hmm… Failure to give a damn.
Why don’t you try to find it, young man?[/quote]
According to the first post of this topic, the starter is probably not retarded and therefore has tried using Google. Posting a link to the most common search engine isn’t most likely helping him them. So if you fail to give a damn, just don’t post.

Yes, more details would help the search.

Read full topic
